Articles.Content:
Hey all,

So I've bin developing a series of ship and would love to share them with the community. This Mostly came about when trying to figure out how to bring a Kerbal Driven Rover to Mun/Minmus and back. I'm sure that you could go to Eve or Duna with these as well. I have only tested the Rover on Kerbal, Mun and Minmus. You can use the X1 Ascender to pretty much take the Rover anywhere on Kerbal. Ive tested the parachute only in the Kerbal atmosphere, so have no idea how it will preform in other conditions. All was done without mods. I will post some pictures in the future.

Have fun and let me know what you think.

X1 Explorer on Minmus

http://imgur.com/fWeWAAo

X1 Ship Series.rar

http://www.filedropper.com/x1shipseries

Edit:

I suggest not flying the X1 Mun Habitat. The Lander setup was a bit untested, hehe.

Edited May 5, 2013 by Hovila
